metric.name: UploadDecision
metric.summary: Whether the upload was proposed to the user or the reasons why it was not. The value is a bitmask of |CardUploadDecisionMetric|.

event.name: Autofill.DeveloperEngagement
event.summary: Recorded when we parse a form to log whether developer has used autocomplete markup or UPI-VPA hints. The value is a bitmask of |DeveloperEngagementMetric|.

event.name: Autofill.FormSubmitted
event.summary: Recorded when user submits a form.

metric.name: AutofillFormSubmittedState
metric.summary: Whether form's fields were all autofilled, some fields were autofilled, or none of the field were autofilled. See |AutofillFormSubmittedState|.

metric.name: MillisecondsSinceFormParsed
metric.summary: Time since form parse.

event.name: Autofill.InteractedWithForm
event.summary: Recorded when we parse a form to log form metadata and autofill settings that apply to all subsequent events for this form.

metric.name: IsForCreditCard
metric.summary: True for credit card forms, false for address/profile forms.

metric.name: LocalRecordTypeCount
metric.summary: Number of local credit cards or local autofill profiles.

metric.name: ServerRecordTypeCount
metric.summary: Number of masked and full server credit cards or server autofill profiles.

metric.name: MillisecondsSinceFormParsed
metric.summary: Time since form parse.

event.name: Autofill.SuggestionFilled
event.summary: Recorded when user selects a suggestion and we fill the form with that suggestion.

metric.name: MillisecondsSinceFormParsed
metric.summary: Time since form parse.

metric.name: RecordType
metric.summary: Whether the suggestion was from a local card/autofill profile or from a server card/autofill profile.

event.name: Autofill.SuggestionsShown
event.summary: Recorded when a suggestion is shown to user.

metric.name: HeuristicType
metric.summary: Field's |ServerFieldType| based on heuristics. See |AutofillField.heuristic_type()|.

metric.name: HtmlFieldType
metric.summary: Field's autocomplete field type hint. See |AutofillField.html_type()|.

metric.name: MillisecondsSinceFormParsed
metric.summary: Time since form parse.

metric.name: ServerType
metric.summary: Field's |ServerFieldType| returned by server. See |AutofillField.server_type()|.

event.name: Autofill.TextFieldDidChange
event.summary: Recorded when user edits a text field. The text field may have been autofilled.

metric.name: FieldTypeGroup
metric.summary: Field's |FieldTypeGroup|. See |AutofillType.group()|.

metric.name: HeuristicType
metric.summary: Field's |ServerFieldType| based on heuristics. See |AutofillField.heuristic_type()|.

metric.name: HtmlFieldMode
metric.summary: Whether the field's autocomplete hint specified 'billing' or 'shipping'. See |AutofillField.html_mode()|.

metric.name: HtmlFieldType
metric.summary: Field's autocomplete field type hint. See |AutofillField.html_type()|.

metric.name: IsAutofilled
metric.summary: True whether field was autofilled. See |AutofillField.is_autofilled|.

metric.name: MillisecondsSinceFormParsed
metric.summary: Time since form parse.

metric.name: ServerType
metric.summary: Field's |ServerFieldType| returned by server. See |AutofillField.server_type()|.

event.name: ContextualSearch
event.summary: Metrics related to a Contextual Search Tap event on a page, for use with Ranker. These metrics are recorded each time the user triggers the Contextual Search UI via a tap gesture (when enabled).

metric.name: DURATION_AFTER_SCROLL_MS
metric.summary: Duration in MS between showing the UI and a subsequent scroll event, or not recorded if there was no subsequent scroll.

metric.name: DURATION_BEFORE_SCROLL_MS
metric.summary: Duration in MS between showing the most recent scroll event and showing the UI, or 0 if no previous scroll event occurred.

metric.name: OUTCOME_WAS_PANEL_OPENED
metric.summary: Whether the user opened the overlay panel. This is the primary outcome metric.

metric.name: OUTCOME_WAS_QUICK_ACTION_CLICKED
metric.summary: Whether the user clicked within the overlay panel when a Quick-Action was shown. This is a secondary outcome metric.

metric.name: OUTCOME_WAS_QUICK_ANSWER_SEEN
metric.summary: Whether the user could see a Quick-Answer caption within the overlay panel. This is a tertiary outcome metric.

metric.name: PREVIOUS_28DAY_CTR_PERCENT
metric.summary: The CTR of the overlay panel for this user, aggregated over a previous 28 day period, expressed as an integer between 0-99.

metric.name: PREVIOUS_28DAY_IMPRESSIONS_COUNT
metric.summary: The count of views of the overlay panel for this user, aggregated over a previous 28 day period.

metric.name: PREVIOUS_WEEK_CTR_PERCENT
metric.summary: The CTR of the overlay panel for this user, aggregated over the previous week, expressed as an integer between 0-99.

metric.name: PREVIOUS_WEEK_IMPRESSIONS_COUNT
metric.summary: The count of views of the overlay panel for this user, aggregated over the previous week.

metric.name: SCREEN_TOP_DPS
metric.summary: The location of the tap relative to the top of the screen, expressed in DPs.

metric.name: WAS_SCREEN_BOTTOM
metric.summary: The location of the tap relative to the bottom of the screen, expressed as an integer with 0 meaning not at the bottom and 1 meaning at the bottom.

event.name: Event.ScrollUpdate.Touch
event.summary: Metrics related to a scroll action caused by the generated ScrollUpdate gesture event.

metric.name: TimeToScrollUpdateSwapBegin
metric.summary: The time in microseconds between the initial creation of a touch event and the start of the frame swap on the GPU service. If no swap was induced by the event, no recording is made.

event.name: Event.ScrollBegin.Touch
event.summary: Metrics related to first scroll action caused by the generated ScrollUpdate gesture event.

metric.name: TimeToScrollUpdateSwapBegin
metric.summary: The time in microseconds between initial creation of a touch event and the start of the frame swap on the GPU service caused by the generated ScrollUpdate gesture event if that ScrollUpdate is the first such event in a given scroll gesture event sequence. If no swap was induced by the event, no recording is made.

event.name: Event.ScrollBegin.Wheel
event.summary: Metrics related to first scroll action caused by the generated ScrollUpdate gesture event.

metric.name: TimeToScrollUpdateSwapBegin
metric.summary: The time in microseconds between the initial creation of a wheel event and the start of the frame swap on the GPU service caused by the generated ScrollUpdate gesture event if that ScrollUpdate is the first such event in a given scroll gesture event sequence. If no swap was induced by the event, no recording is made.

event.name: Media.WatchTime
event.summary:
Watch time is defined as the amount of elapsed media time for audio+video media aggregated per player instance. A minimum of 7 seconds of unmuted, foreground media must be watched to start watch time monitoring. Watch time is checked on a regular basis and reported upon one of the stop events mentioned below or at player destruction if none occur prior.
Any one of paused, hidden, or muted is sufficient to stop watch time metric reports. Each of these has a hysteresis where if the state change is undone within some time, the watch time will be counted as uninterrupted.
Power events (on/off battery power) have a similar hysteresis, but unlike the aforementioned properties, will not stop metric collection.
Native controls events have a similar behavior than power events.
Each seek event will result in a new watch time metric being started and the old metric finalized as accurately as possible.

event.name: PageLoad
event.summary: Core metrics associated with web page loads.

metric.name: DocumentTiming.NavigationToDOMContentLoadedEventFired
metric.summary: Measures the time in milliseconds from navigation timing's navigation start to the time the DOMContentLoaded event is fired, for main frame documents.

metric.name: DocumentTiming.NavigationToLoadEventFired
metric.summary: Measures the time in milliseconds from navigation timing's navigation start to the time the load event is fired, for main frame documents.

metric.name: Experimental.PaintTiming.NavigationToFirstMeaningfulPaint
metric.summary: Measures the time in milliseconds from navigation timing's navigation start to the first meaningful paint (http://bit.ly/ttfmp-doc), for main frame documents.

metric.name: Navigation.PageTransition
metric.summary: The |ui::PageTransition| for the main frame navigation of this page load.

metric.name: Net.EffectiveConnectionType.OnNavigationStart
metric.summary: The |net::EffectiveConnectionType| at the time the navigation for this page load was initiated.

metric.name: Net.ErrorCode.OnFailedProvisionalLoad
metric.summary: The |net::Error| code for this page load. Only logged for failed provisional navigations.

metric.name: Net.HttpRttEstimate.OnNavigationStart
metric.summary: The HTTP round trip time estimate for this page load, at the time the navigation for this page load was initiated.

metric.name: Net.TransportRttEstimate.OnNavigationStart
metric.summary: The transport round trip time estimate for this page load, at the time the navigation for this page load was initiated.

metric.name: PageTiming.ForegroundDuration
metric.summary: For page loads that start in the foreground, measures the duration of time in milliseconds until one of the following events occurs: the load of the main resource fails, the page load is stopped, the tab hosting the page is closed, the render process hosting the page goes away, a new navigation which later commits is initiated in the same tab, or the tab hosting the page is backgrounded. This metric has a very long tail, for pages that spend a long period of time in the foreground. As such, use of the mean or tail values are not recommended.

metric.name: PageTiming.NavigationToFailedProvisionalLoad
metric.summary: Measures the time in milliseconds from navigation timing's navigation start to the time the provisional load failed. Only measures provisional loads that failed in the foreground.

metric.name: PaintTiming.NavigationToFirstContentfulPaint
metric.summary: Measures the time in milliseconds from navigation timing's navigation start to the time when the page first paints content. A contentful paint includes a paint of text, image, SVG, or canvas.

metric.name: PaintTiming.NavigationToFirstPaint
metric.summary: Measures the time in milliseconds from navigation timing's navigation start to the time the first paint is performed.

metric.name: ParseTiming.NavigationToParseStart
metric.summary: Measures the time in milliseconds from navigation timing's navigation start to the time the parser started, for main frame documents.

metric.name: CompletionsStatus
metric.summary: How the Payment Request ended. Values defined in the CompletionStatus enum of components/payments/core/journey_logger.h.

metric.name: Events
metric.summary: Bitfield representing the events that occurred during the Payment Request. Values defined in the Event enum of components/payments/core/journey_logger.h.

event.name: Plugins.FlashInstance
event.summary: Recorded when a Flash object instance is created.

event.name: Translate
event.summary: Metrics related to a Translate event. These metrics are described in TranslateEventProto.
